## concatA variable

Same as [concat](./seq.concat.md)<!-- -->, but optimized for nullable arraylike values.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
concatA: <T>(...args: Nullable<ArrayLike<T>>[]) => ISeq<T> | undefined
```
